subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Police Say Gunman Mailed Manifesto To News Station
body:
Police say Virginia Tech shooting Cho-Shun-We is believed to have sent a 
manifesto, multiple photos and video to NBC News which were apparently 
mailed after his first shootings but before his second shootings, two hours 
later.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
